Let's list what this expansion brings compared with the original Half-Life:
[list]
[*] New enemies - check.
[*] New friendly NPCs - check.
[*] New weapons - check.
[*] New game mechanics (night seeing googles and rope climbing) - check.
[*] New information on HL lore - check.
[*] Multiple references to the original (so a player can feel nostalgic) - check.
[/list]
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2260664260

Do not forget that OF is at least half as long as the original HL.
"Opposing Force" is an excellent example of how to make an expansion.

this game is awesome. It takes everything that was great about the original half life that yo know and love, adding onto it in organic and creative ways with just the right mix of familiarity and mystery, while chock full of references to the other games that give you those "hey I remember that" moments. It also gives a great shift in perspective to the soldiers sent in to kill gordon. and the other grunts are given great characterization, and are very useful in ways that make them seem less extra than the scientists in the fist game. And by the way, the pistol with a laser on it is a desert eagle and fills the roll of the magnum. It took me way too long to figure out that I didn't just have two pistols

Half life: Opposing Force
yes

Good: It's Half Life with a green HUD and more weapons and more aliens. You also get allies to fight for you.

Bad: Don't think that just because of the title or old ads you saw in the '90s in gaming magazines that you are going to actually fight Freeman. You have only one opportunity to do so and shooting him results in a game over because it causes a time paradox for obvious reasons.

Ugly: Nothing.

норм игрулька

En Opposing Force tomas el papel de uno de los marines mandados por el gobierno de los EEUU para tapar el desastre de Black-Mesa. Realmente ellos creen que van a un entrenamiento (pobrecitos). 

La que lía Gordon que sólo tenía que empujar un carrito debajo de un láser es para hacérselo mirar. Yo desde luego no estudiaría en el MIT para acabar siendo un empujacarritos.

El caso es que una vez llegas a Black Mesa te encuentras que se ha abierto un portál de no sabes muy bien donde y está todo lleno de bichos extraterrestres que quieren matarte (he echado de menos los asaltacabezas). Una de las cosas buenas de Opposing Force es el arsenal de armas disponibles. Es sin duda el más amplio de todos los Half-Life hasta día de hoy.

Como aspecto negativo, resaltar que por algún motivo, el juego está en inglés, cuando originalmente salió en completo castellano. Pero si te metes en los foros verás por ahí el parche para solucionarlo. 
Sólo puedo recomendar este juego, es intenso, juegas la historia del Half-Life original desde otro punto de vista, y además va perfecto en mi RTX 3090 con los ajustes en medio-alto.
Its ok I guess

Half-Life: Opposing Force is often regarded as one of (if not the best) the best expansion packs of all time. It adds new creatures, new weapons, new places, and a new story for you to explore within the Black Mesa Research Facility. Furthermore, the entire game is very fun to play and feels satisfying when firing guns / weapons. However, the ending can be quite confusing / difficult even on the lowest difficulty setting. I just view this as a nice challenge and continue to love this game!

you play as big man adrian shephard on his wacky adventures in the black messa. you're one of the hecu marines from the original game, sent into black mesa in an unkown mission when your helicopter is destroyed before you recieve your orders. you then have to battle out as the place becomes an interdimensional warzone while fighting the new "Race X" of xenian creatures.

Clasicazo!!! Un half life donde el protagonista ya no es el físico que se madrea a todos sino un marine. 
¿Qué es lo genial de este juego? 
Muchas armas. Nuevos enemigos: toda una raza X para probar tus lindas bebés (armas). 
¿Qué más quieres? Ah, sí. Montón de referencias al half life original, es canónico!!!!

Моё любимое дополнение для Half-Life, в первую очередь добавлено множество нового оружия как инопланетного так и обычного огнестрельного- Desert Eagle, M249 и мое любимое снайперка, еще интересная геймплейная фишка это оружие мини барнакл, чтобы пересекать расстояния в воздухе, примерно как крюк-кошка в Just Cause. Так же длительность дополнения впечатляет, за это время врятли оно надоест.Но есть проблема с лифтами различного типа, при спуске или подъёме можно в нем застрять, поэтому лучше прыгать на месте во время спуска.

An entertaining expansion that that many will sadly overlook.

While not as long or engrossing as the original game, this side story provides a welcome perspective from the side that hunted Gordon Freeman, with some "Predator" like elements, like some of the soldier characters that get hyped up at the start of the game. Disappointingly the character interaction and commands that the tutorial introduces are underutilized in the game.

7/10
